name: Oozy Onslaught
description:
Oozy Onslaught is a fast paced first person shooter, which tasks the player to delve deep into the city sewers to eliminate a horde of evil toxic sludge monsters that seems to keep growing more powerful and developing new types of adversaries the further you get into the sewer depths.

The only way you can defeat these creatures is with an arsenal of powerful orbs which will boost your weapons efficiency greatly, and can even evolve into completely different weapons if you can survive long enough.

CONTROLS

  • Movement                - WASD or ZQSD
  • (Double) Jump        - SPACE
  • Sprint                            - LEFT SHIFT
  • Shoot                             - LEFT CLICK
